憙字的基本解释

憙
xǐ
古同“喜”。
指容易发生某种变化：“有叶者，憙烂。”

憙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǐ］
［《廣韻》虚里切，上止，曉。］
［《廣韻》許記切，去志，曉。］
(1)同“喜”。喜悦。
(2)喜好；爱好。
(3)谓容易发生某种变化。

憙字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憙； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页402第25
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】許旣切【正韻】許意切，?嬉去聲。【說文】悅也。从心从喜，喜亦聲。【徐鍇曰】喜在心，憙見爲此事，是心悅爲此事也，會意。【史記·周本紀】無不欣憙。　又好也。【賈誼·治安策】遇之有禮，則羣臣自憙。【註】憙，好也。　又省作喜。【史記·封禪書】天子心獨喜。又【扁鵲傳】問中庶子喜方者。?讀許旣切。【集韻】亦書作憘。　又【廣韻】虛里切【集韻】【韻會】許已切【正韻】許里切，?音蟢。樂也。亦省作喜。　又【集韻】虛其切，音唏。【說文】卒喜也。本作㰻。或从喜作歖。或从心作憙。亦作憘。【後漢·蔡邕傳】試潛聽之曰憘。【註】音僖，歎聲也。

憙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憙字的起名意思

同"喜"。喜悦；喜好；爱好。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
xǐ
Gu Tong "hi".
Refers to a certain kind of change: "Those who have leaves are bad."
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xǐ］
["Guangyun" Xu Liqie, top stop, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiqie, Quzhi, Xiao. ]
(1) Same as "happy". joy.
(2) Preferences; hobbies.
(3) It is said that certain changes are prone to occur.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憙; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 402 25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Xu Yinqie [Zheng Yun] Xu Yiqie, snorting. [Said the text] Yue Ye. From the heart to the joy, the joy is also the sound. [Xu Kai said] I'm happy in my heart, but I don't see it because I feel happy about it, knowing it. 【Historical Records·Zhou Benji】All are happy.　It's good too. 【Jia Yi·Policy of Public Security】A courteous encounter will cause the officials to be self-sufficient. [Note] Xi, good too.　Sorry for joy again. [Historical Records · Feng Chan Book] The emperor's heart is happy. Also [Biography of Bian Que] asks those who are happy with the concubine. ? Read Xu Yangqie. [Ji Yun] Yi Shu Zuo Chang.　[Guangyun] Xu Liqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Xu already cut [Zhengyun] Xu Liqie,? Yin Yun. Le also. Also save for joy.　[Jiyun] Void and cut, and sound. [Said the text] You are happy too. This is made 㰻. Or from Xi Zuo She. Or from the heart. Also known as Chang. [Later Han·Cai Yong Biography] Trial to listen to it is called Chang. [Note] Yin Xi, sigh.

Name meaning
Same as "Hi". Joy; preference; hobby.
xī, xǐ
I xǐ гл.
1) радоваться; с радостью
无不欣憙 все довольны и радуются
2) вм. 喜 (любить, находить удовольствие)

ох!; охать, вздыхать
